name: Portfolio Website
description: My Portfolio website build with ASP.NET, Build to make updating my portfolio easier and quicker.
Info_Image: This was my first project in ASP.NET, After doing some small tutorial projects following along with a youtube video series I started to work on this website.I learned how to read data from a JSON file and pass that data through a controller to a model. Then when loading the page gets all its data from said model.

name: Noot
description: A 2D game made in collaboration with other students of different disciplines
Info_Image: Noot was my first experience working with digital artists in creating a game. I had to learn how to communicate the ideas i had in ways that they would understand and be able to use. Alot of new techniques were used that i had to learn for example tilemaps, importing and adapting sprites. It also was the first project that i worked with an agile workflow, using sprints and stand-ups to make sure we were steadily progressing to a finished product

name: Skelly Shooter
description: A 2D action-platformer, Build in unity and utilizing the animation and sprite systems
Info_Image: Skelly shooter was a project to challenge myself. i hadn't done a project before with actual art and only used primitive shapes to represent stuff. With using art also came the territory of animation. I had to learn how to create animations and use sprite animations.
